name: Led It Rain
description: Motorcycles, guns, monsters and bikini-babes. Led It Rain is first person shooter motorcycle driving racing game. Faster you drive and shoot monsters more score you obtain. Each race track has three laps of horror and adrenaline. Scream!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 Processor: 2GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or similar DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows8 Processor: 3GHz Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
